https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kUf8mUpMQFu35RzhTz84Oky0Emy.jpg Industrial Hitachi City is the location for this post-3.11 drama. Still recovering from the tsunami, Shiori receives news of her husband’s accidental death, which marks the start of a personal recovery that mirrors the town’s for Shiori as well as forgiveness of surviving coworker Takumi. Cold Bloom
